about_the_game:
At Eve's Wake is an interactive Lovecraftian horror story about surviving a family you never knew and their servitude to a dark patron. Discover what your family knows and does to win, only to have it used against them by your actions. All this knowledge remains with you through victory or death, beyond the bounds of time and space. Armed with this knowledge, your actions will shape your fate and that of the family. Will you embrace this gift or rid humanity of their taint?

Features
- Personality trait-based play styles that affect actions, dialog options and overall difficulty.
- Four distinctly different endings.
- Return to earlier save points and change the course of the story.
- Knowledge gained carries over to subsequent play-throughs.

You decide your fate
There are no higher forces that will track your story progression.
In short, there is no auto-save function. With this gift you can unravel reality and discover alternative solutions.
Just remember that you need to save by yourself, how else can I help you?




Personality
Are you strong, smart or charismatic? These personality traits influence how you respond to situations, and how people will perceive you.

Each personality offers an unique play style, providing different dialog options and insights during your play through. It also sets the difficulty of the story and how you can overcome certain obstacles.

Might makes right
Aggressive and physical actions will prove more successful. Brute-force your way to success.

Wits is a dangerous weapon and you know to use it discreetly
Provides additional insight to situations and allows for easier escapes.

Charming is always getting a yes to a question you never had to ask
Persuasive actions will prove more successful, but don't expect more.

Choices
Armed with knowledge you will be able to make choices that alter the direction of the story.

Will you redeem your family or join their folds and lead?

Sanity
How you ultimately choose to shape your fate can affect your fragile state of mind.

Certain actions cause the human mind to go on a path spiraling down. Some slide down slowly without even knowing and and some do so fully aware tumbling face first down the steps.

Music from beyond the Stars
Each story begins with a clean slate and state of mind. Whilst you cannot track your current sanity, there are a total of 3 states. This means that there are a total of 3 layers to the music you can hear. Whether this is a blessing or a curse, is something only you can decide.
Regardless I will be there.


Raised by your mother, you’ve never known your family. Her sudden passing left you with many questions she never answered you: Why can’t I remember my family? Why did she split with the family? What happened to my father?

Until that letter arrived; your grandmother had passed away. Here you are now, letter in hand, before the gates of the family estate. At what should be just a funeral and nothing more.

Soon you realize why your mother left, as you are thrown into a gauntlet of fire — for a new successor must come. The time for Convergence has begun...

content_descriptors.notes:
Psychological Horror, Murder Mystery

Major elements:
Vivid descriptions of violence, murder and death.

Minor elements:
Real life bigotry and belittlement,
Implied abuse in relationships and family, description of suicide.
